text: Egh ia aruer arɨzimɨn gumazir damazir okavizimɨn mɨn punpunigh daru pura suighsuigh tuavim buri egh tam batoghan kogham. Eghtɨ bizir ia amiba tamɨn daghetam deragh otoghan kogham, mati gumazim mɨtarmemɨn aven arui mokɨn. Eghtɨ gumaziba zurara ia abɨnɨva ian biziba okɨmam, eghtɨ gumazir ian akurvaghamiba puvatɨgham.
